verses.verse: Hear, <S%H8085><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> you are to pass over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> to dispossess <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than yourself, <S%H5892><s%> cities great <S%H1419><s%> and fortified up <S%H1219><s%> to the sky, <S%H8064><s%>

a people <S%H5971><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakim, <S%H6062><s%> whom you know, <S%H3045><s%> and of whom you have heard <S%H8085><s%> say, <S%H3320><s%> "Who can stand before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak? <S%H6061><s%>"

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore this day, <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is he who goes over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you as a devouring <S%H398><s%> fire; <S%H784><s%> he will destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, <S%H3665><s%> and he will bring them down before you: <S%H6440><s%> so you shall drive them out, <S%H3423><s%> and make them to perish <S%H6><s%> quickly, <S%H4118><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken to you. <S%H1696><s%>

Don't <S%H559><s%> say in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> after Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has thrust them out <S%H1920><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H559><s%> saying, "For my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has brought me in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> this land; <S%H776><s%>" because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> drives them out <S%H3423><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you because of the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these nations. <S%H1471><s%>

Not for your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> or for the uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of your heart, <S%H3824><s%> do you go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> their land; <S%H776><s%> but for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> does drive them out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H6965><s%> and that he may establish the word <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore, <S%H3068><s%> that Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> doesn't <S%H5414><s%> give you this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it for your righteousness; <S%H6666><s%> for you are a stiff-necked <S%H6203><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> don't <S%H7911><s%> forget, how you provoked Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%> in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that you went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> until you came <S%H935><s%> to this place, <S%H4725><s%> you have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Also in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> you provoked <S%H7107><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to wrath, <S%H7107><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with you to destroy you. <S%H8045><s%>

When I was gone up <S%H5927><s%> onto the mountain <S%H2022><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> with you, <S%H3427><s%> then I stayed on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights; <S%H3915><s%> I neither ate <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drank <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> to me the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> with the finger <S%H676><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and on them were all the words <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with you on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly. <S%H6951><s%>

It came to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights, <S%H3915><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> me the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H6965><s%> "Arise, get down <S%H3381><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> from here; <S%H5971><s%> for your people whom you have brought out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves; <S%H4118><s%> they have quickly turned aside <S%H5493><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them; <S%H6213><s%> they have made them a molten image. <S%H4541><s%>"

Furthermore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, "I have seen <S%H7200><s%> this people, <S%H5971><s%> and behold, <S%H6203><s%> it is a stiff-necked people: <S%H5971><s%>

let me alone, <S%H7503><s%> that I may destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, <S%H4229><s%> and blot out their name <S%H8034><s%> from under the sky; <S%H8064><s%> and I will make <S%H6213><s%> of <S%H854><s%> you a nation <S%H1471><s%> mightier <S%H6099><s%> and greater than they. <S%H7227><s%>"

So I turned <S%H6437><s%> and came down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> was burning <S%H1197><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> were in my two <S%H8147><s%> hands. <S%H3027><s%>

I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2398><s%> you had sinned against Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> you had made <S%H6213><s%> yourselves a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf: <S%H5695><s%> you had turned aside <S%H5493><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had commanded you. <S%H6680><s%>

I took <S%H8610><s%> hold of the two <S%H8147><s%> tables, <S%H3871><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them out of <S%H5921><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> them before your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

I fell down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as at the first, <S%H7223><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights; <S%H3915><s%> I neither ate <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drank <S%H8354><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%> because of all your sin <S%H2403><s%> which you sinned, <S%H2398><s%> in doing <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to provoke him to anger. <S%H3707><s%>

For I was afraid <S%H3025><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> and hot displeasure, <S%H2534><s%> with which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H7107><s%> against you to destroy <S%H8045><s%> you. <S%H3068><s%> But Yahweh listened <S%H8085><s%> to me that time also. <S%H6471><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H599><s%> with Aaron <S%H175><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> him: <S%H6419><s%> and I prayed for Aaron <S%H175><s%> also at the same time. <S%H6256><s%>

I took <S%H3947><s%> your sin, <S%H2403><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> which you had made, <S%H6213><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> it with fire, <S%H784><s%> and stamped <S%H3807><s%> it, <S%H2912><s%> grinding it very small, <S%H3190><s%> until it was as fine <S%H1854><s%> as dust: <S%H6083><s%> and I cast <S%H7993><s%> its dust <S%H6083><s%> into the brook <S%H5158><s%> that descended out <S%H3381><s%> of the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>
At Taberah, <S%H8404><s%> and at Massah, <S%H4532><s%> and at Kibroth Hattaavah, <S%H6914><s%> you provoked Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to wrath. <S%H7107><s%>

When Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> you from Kadesh Barnea, <S%H6947><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Go up <S%H5927><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> you; <S%H4784><s%>" then you rebelled against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and you didn't <S%H539><s%> believe him, <S%H8085><s%> nor listen to his voice. <S%H6963><s%>
You have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that I knew you. <S%H3045><s%>

So I fell down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> the forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%> that I fell down, <S%H5307><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> he would destroy you. <S%H8045><s%>

I prayed <S%H6419><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Lord <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> don't <S%H7843><s%> destroy your people <S%H5971><s%> and your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> that you have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> through your greatness, <S%H1433><s%> that you have brought out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> your servants, <S%H5650><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> don't <S%H6437><s%> look to the stubbornness <S%H7190><s%> of this people, <S%H5971><s%> nor to their wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> nor to their sin, <S%H2403><s%>

lest the land <S%H776><s%> you brought us out <S%H3318><s%> from say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Because Yahweh was not able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which he promised <S%H1696><s%> to them, <S%H8135><s%> and because he hated them, <S%H3318><s%> he has brought them out to kill <S%H4191><s%> them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>'

Yet they are your people <S%H5971><s%> and your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which you brought out <S%H3318><s%> by your great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by your outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm. <S%H2220><s%>"
